mapper.select: select part.parts_type as status, count(*) as totalCount from ope_parts part where part.dr = 0 group by part.parts_type

select part.id as id, part.parts_number as productN, part.cn_name as productCnName, part.en_name as productEnName, part.fr_name as productFrName, part.parts_type as type, part.updated_time as refuseTime from ope_parts part
order by part.updated_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
